name: Sugar Princess
description:
During the week we were able to achieve good results. The jam theme was "Foodfight" and we decided to make your sweet kingdom, which is completely made personally.

Our kingdom contains a lot of different Houdini mechanics that we used in our work. There were projects that did not have time to get into the release due to time, but we used the most important one and got a wonderful result! The speed of work was greatly accelerated due to the possibilities of procedural construction.

Story

The story of the sugar princess is very simple, but even such a story can change the whole world. 

Once upon a time there was a princess and one day, when she was returning to her castle, she saw that her beautiful sugar city was invaded by evil vegetables, and vegetable evil settled in the center of the city! 

The princess didn't lose her head and made herself a handgun that shoots cookies, from improvised things. She knew that the only thing that could to stop this evil - is a sweet cannon that was sealed in jam in the main squares of the city. She needs to get the parts of the cannon and make a powerful weapon to destroy this terror on the throne of evil - radish! 

Help the sugar princess to overcome and come out winner in this story!

Credits

Thank you a lot to play in our game! Since this is our first game, we are very proud of it, but if you have any mistakes or bugs, we will be happy to listen to you!
